Package com.github.twitch4j.eventsub.subscriptions

Class UserAuthorizationGrantType

java.lang.Object
com.github.twitch4j.eventsub.subscriptions.UserAuthorizationGrantType
All Implemented Interfaces:
SubscriptionType<UserAuthorizationGrantCondition,UserAuthorizationGrantCondition.UserAuthorizationGrantConditionBuilder<?,?>,UserAuthorizationGrantEvent>
public class UserAuthorizationGrantType extends Object implements SubscriptionType<UserAuthorizationGrantCondition,UserAuthorizationGrantCondition.UserAuthorizationGrantConditionBuilder<?,?>,UserAuthorizationGrantEvent>
A user has granted authorization for your client id.

Provided client_id must match the client id in the application access token.
